title: World Wide Haxe 2014
description:
The 4th International Haxe Conference. Held 23th to 26th May 2014 in Montreuil, France.
More info on silexlabs.org/2014/

videos.title: WWX2014 Nicolas Cannasse : "One year of Haxe" part1/4
videos.description:
Nicolas Cannasse's speech at WWX2014 (part 1/4) other videos, photos, slides and comments :
http://www.silexlabs.org/202725/the-blog/nicolas-cannasses-speech-at-wwx2014-one-year-of-haxe/ ‎

The 4th International Haxe Conference WWX2014 organized by Silex Labs took place from 23th to 26th may 2014 in Paris.
http://wwx.silexlabs.org/2014/
